summary: An ordinance relating to the acquisition of land and other property in the southwest one-quarter of the northeast one-quarter of Section 4, Township 25 North, Range 4 East, W. M., for Park and Playground purposes, authorizing the City Engineer to negotiate for the purchase thereof, pending condemnation under Ordinance No. 78386; and making an appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Fund therefor.
committee: Finance and Parks and Public Grounds
